sqls.sql: INSERT INTO "OLD_出品マスタ情報" SELECT :masterkey ,M.* FROM "NEW_出品マスタ情報" M WHERE NOT EXISTS( select 1 from "INPUT_出品詳細情報" D where D."店舗名" = M."店舗名" and D."出品者SKU" = M."SKU番号" and D."ASIN 1" = M."ASIN番号" ) AND M."商品種別" = '子商品'
DELETE FROM "NEW_出品マスタ情報" M WHERE EXISTS( select 1 from "OLD_出品マスタ情報" D where D."店舗名" = M."店舗名" and D."SKU番号" = M."SKU番号" and D."ASIN番号" = M."ASIN番号" and D."del_date" = :masterkey )

insert into "OLD_出品マスタ情報" SELECT :masterkey ,N.* FROM "NEW_出品マスタ情報" N WHERE ("店舗名","商品管理番号") in ( SELECT T."店舗名", T."商品管理番号" FROM ( SELECT M."店舗名", M."商品管理番号", ( select count(*) from "NEW_出品マスタ情報" where "店舗名" = M."店舗名" and "商品管理番号" = M."商品管理番号" AND "商品種別" = '子商品' ) as "商品数量" FROM (SELECT distinct "店舗名","商品管理番号" FROM "NEW_出品マスタ情報") M ) T WHERE T."商品数量" = 0 ) ORDER BY N."店舗名", N."商品管理番号", N."色", N."サイズ"

select D."店舗名" as shopname, '' as productno, '' as productdiv, '子商品' as producttype, '' as color, '' as size, D."出品者SKU" as sku, D."ASIN 1" as asin, D."商品名" as productname from "INPUT_出品詳細情報" D where not exists( select 1 from "NEW_出品マスタ情報" M where M."店舗名" = D."店舗名" and M."SKU番号" = D."出品者SKU" and M."ASIN番号" = D."ASIN 1" ) order by D."店舗名", D."商品名"
DELETE FROM "NEW_出品マスタ情報" WHERE "店舗名" = :shop
INSERT INTO "NEW_出品マスタ情報" VALUES ( :col0,--REQ_NO :col1,--店舗名 :col2,--商品管理番号 :col3,--商品分類 :col4,--商品種別 :col5,--色 :col6,--サイズ :col7,--SKU番号 :col8 --ASIN番号 )

SELECT M."店舗名" as shopname, M."商品管理番号" as productno, M."商品分類" as productdiv, M."商品種別" as producttype, M."色" as color, M."サイズ" as size, M."SKU番号" as sku, M."ASIN番号" as asin FROM "NEW_出品マスタ情報" M left join "MASTER_ソート情報" C on C."大区分" = M."商品管理番号" and C."小区分" = '色' and M."色" = C."内容" left join "MASTER_ソート情報" S on S."大区分" = M."商品分類" and S."小区分" = 'サイズ' and M."サイズ" = S."内容" WHERE M."店舗名" = :shop ORDER BY M."店舗名", M."商品管理番号", M."商品種別", COALESCE(C."ソート",M."色"), COALESCE(S."ソート",M."サイズ")

SELECT T1."商品管理番号" as productno, T1."商品分類" as productdiv, T1."SKU番号" as sku, T1."ASIN番号" as asin, T1."商品名称" as productname, ( SELECT count(*) FROM "MASTER_出品マスタ情報" T2 WHERE T1."商品管理番号" = T2."商品管理番号" AND T2."商品種別" = '子商品' AND T2."店舗名" = T1."店舗名" ) as subq, ( SELECT count(distinct coalesce(T2."サイズ",'')) FROM "MASTER_出品マスタ情報" T2 WHERE T1."商品管理番号" = T2."商品管理番号" AND T2."商品種別" = '子商品' AND COALESCE(T2."色",'') = COALESCE(T4."色",'') AND T2."店舗名" = T1."店舗名" ) as subcq, T1."商品写真" as productpic, T5."色" as subcolor, T4."サイズ" as subsize, T4."SKU番号" as subsku, T4."ASIN番号" as sukuasin FROM "MASTER_出品マスタ情報" T1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T3."店舗名", T3."商品管理番号", T3."色", T3."サイズ", T3."SKU番号", T3."ASIN番号", ROW_NUMBER() OVER(partition BY T3."商品管理番号" ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(T3."並び順",'999')) NB FROM "MASTER_出品マスタ情報" T3 WHERE T3."商品種別" = '子商品' AND T3."店舗名" = :shop ) TEMP WHERE TEMP.NB = 1 ) T4 ON T1."商品管理番号" = T4."商品管理番号" LEFT JOIN "MASTER_写真情報" T5 ON T4."店舗名" = T5."店舗名" AND T4."商品管理番号" = T5."商品管理番号" AND COALESCE(T4."色",'') = COALESCE(T5."色",'') WHERE T1."商品種別" = '親商品' AND T1."店舗名" = :shop ORDER BY T1."商品管理番号"

SELECT T5."商品管理番号" as productno, T5."色" as subcolor, T5."サイズ" as subsize, T5."SKU番号" as subsku, T5."ASIN番号" as subasin, T5."並び順" FROM "MASTER_出品マスタ情報" T5, ( SELECT distinct TEMP."商品管理番号", TEMP."色" FROM ( SELECT T3."商品管理番号", T3."色", T3."サイズ", T3."SKU番号", T3."ASIN番号", ROW_NUMBER() OVER(partition BY T3."商品管理番号" ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(T3."並び順",'999')) NB FROM "MASTER_出品マスタ情報" T3 WHERE T3."商品種別" = '子商品' AND T3."店舗名" = :shop ) TEMP WHERE TEMP.NB = 1 ORDER BY TEMP."商品管理番号" ) TEMP1 WHERE T5."商品管理番号" = TEMP1."商品管理番号" AND COALESCE(T5."色",'') = COALESCE(TEMP1."色",'') AND T5."店舗名" = :shop AND TO_NUMBER(T5."並び順",'999') > 1 ORDER BY T5."商品管理番号",TO_NUMBER(T5."並び順",'999')

SELECT TEMP."商品管理番号" as productno, TEMP."色" as subcolor, TEMP."サイズ" as subsize, TEMP."SKU番号" as subsku, TEMP."ASIN番号" as subasin FROM ( SELECT T3."商品管理番号", T3."色", T3."サイズ", T3."SKU番号", T3."ASIN番号", ROW_NUMBER() OVER(partition BY T3."商品管理番号" ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(T3."並び順",'999')) NB FROM "MASTER_出品マスタ情報" T3 WHERE T3."商品種別" = '子商品' AND T3."店舗名" = :shop ) TEMP WHERE TEMP.NB > 1

SELECT T1."商品管理番号" as productno, T1."色" as subcolor, T5."商品写真" as productpic,
( SELECT count(distinct coalesce(T2."サイズ",'')) FROM "MASTER_出品マスタ情報" T2 WHERE T2."商品管理番号" = T1."商品管理番号" AND T2."商品種別" = '子商品' AND COALESCE(T2."色",'') = COALESCE(T1."色",'') AND T2."店舗名" = :shop ) as subcq, T1."サイズ" as subsize, T1."SKU番号" as subsku, T1."ASIN番号" as subasin, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(partition BY T1."商品管理番号",T1."色" ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(T1."並び順",'999')) "subsort" FROM "MASTER_出品マスタ情報" T1, ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T3."商品管理番号", T3."色", ROW_NUMBER() OVER(partition BY T3."商品管理番号" ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(T3."並び順",'999')) NB FROM "MASTER_出品マスタ情報" T3 WHERE T3."商品種別" = '子商品' AND T3."店舗名" = :shop ) TEMP WHERE TEMP.NB = 1 ) T4, "MASTER_写真情報" T5
WHERE T1."商品管理番号" = T4."商品管理番号" AND COALESCE(T1."色",'') <> COALESCE(T4."色",'') AND T1."商品種別" = '子商品' AND T1."店舗名" = :shop AND T4."商品管理番号" = T5."商品管理番号" AND COALESCE(T1."色",'') = COALESCE(T5."色",'') AND T1."店舗名" = T5."店舗名" ORDER BY T1."商品管理番号",TO_NUMBER(T1."並び順",'999')

SELECT T1."商品名" as productname, T1."出品者SKU" as sku, T1."ASIN 1" as asin FROM "INPUT_出品詳細情報" T1 LEFT JOIN "MASTER_出品マスタ情報" T2 ON T2."SKU番号" = T1."出品者SKU" and T2."ASIN番号" = T1."ASIN 1" and T2."店舗名" = :shop WHERE T2."SKU番号" IS NULL AND T1."店舗名" = :shop ORDER BY T1."商品名"
SELECT "出品者SKU" as SKU, "ASIN 1" as ASIN, "商品名" as PRODUCTNAME FROM "INPUT_出品詳細情報" A WHERE A."商品名" LIKE concat('%', :freeword ,'%') AND A."店舗名" = :shop

INSERT INTO "MASTER_出品マスタ情報" VALUES ( :shop,--店舗名 :col0,--商品管理番号 :col1,--商品分類 :col2,--SKU番号 :col3,--ASIN番号 :col4,--ラベル番号 :col5,--商品名称 :col6,--価格 :col7,--FBM在庫数量 :col8,--FBA在庫数量 :col9,--商品種別 :col10, --出品タイプ :col11, --写真 :col12, --並び順 :col13, --色 :col14 --サイズ )

SELECT T2."ラベル番号" as LABEL, T1."商品名" as PRODUCTNAME, T1."価格" as PRICE, T1."数量" as FBMQUANTITY, T2."在庫数量" as FBAQUANTITY FROM "INPUT_出品詳細情報" T1 LEFT JOIN "INPUT_FBA在庫情報" T2 ON T1."出品者SKU" = T2."SKU番号" AND T1."ASIN 1" = T2."ASIN番号" WHERE T1."出品者SKU" = :sku AND T1."ASIN 1" = :asin AND T1."店舗名" = :shop
DELETE FROM "MASTER_出品マスタ情報" T1 WHERE T1."商品管理番号" = :productno AND T1."店舗名" = :shop
DELETE FROM "MASTER_写真情報" T1 WHERE T1."商品管理番号" = :productno AND T1."店舗名" = :shop
INSERT INTO "MASTER_写真情報" VALUES ( :shop,--店舗名 :col0,--商品管理番号 :col1,--色 :col2 --写真 )
SELECT "P_ID" as pid, "NAME_CN" as namecn, "NAME_JP" as namejp, "COUNT" as ct FROM "MASTER_発送商品マスタ情報" A ORDER BY "P_ID"

SELECT "P_ID" as pid, "DIV" as div, "NAME_CN" as namecn, "NAME_JP" as namejp, "COLOR" as color, "SIZE" as size, "COUNT" as ct, "BIKO" as biko, "PIC" as pic FROM "MASTER_発送商品マスタ情報5" A WHERE "DEL_FLG" != '1' ORDER BY "P_ID"
INSERT INTO "MASTER_発送商品マスタ情報5" VALUES ( DEFAULT, :col1, :col2, :col3, :col4, :col5, :col6, :col7, :col8 )
